data.Name: Open Hole
data.Description: There is no cemented casing though the reservoir interval.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Perforation
data.Description: Connections between the reservoir and the wellbore are created by a device that creates holes in the casing.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Pre-perforated
data.Description: A section of liner or tubing with holes or slots that were made before being placed in the well.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Punch
data.Description: A hole created one at a time in the casing or tubing.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Perforated
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="Perforation" with Name="Perforation" instead. Opening created from explosive perforating through pipe. Perforating is the process of piercing the casing wall and the cement behind it to provide openings through which formation fluids may enter the borehole.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Screen
data.Description: Mechanical opening created from installation of a screen along the reservoir interval.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Sliding Sleeve
data.Description: Mechanical Opening created from installation of a sliding sleeve in the production tubing which can be opened (or closed) thus creating a flowpath  to the surface.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Slotted Liner
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="Preperforated" with Name="Pre-perforated" instead. Mechanical Opening created from installation of slotted liner along the reservoir interval. The slots allow hydraulic communication between the reservoir and the production tubing. This type includes holed or preperforated liner.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Tubing Punch
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="Punch" with Name="Punch" instead. Tubing punches enable circulation to be achieved between tubing and an annulus open to the reservoir.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).
